title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate Your Cloud Journey with AWS Transform (TNC208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS Transform 加速您的云之旅 (TNC208)
abstract: Embark on a faster, smoother cloud transformation with agentic AI and integrated solutions. This session reveals how AWS Transform accelerates your cloud journey, addressing migration and modernization challenges through intelligent automation. Through real-world examples, discover how to leverage this powerful integration to fast-track your cloud adoption and transformation efforts. With the specialized AI agents of AWS Transform, customers can migrate VMware workloads to Amazon EC2, modernize .NET applications to cross-platform .NET, and modernize IBM z/OS mainframe applications, delivering transformation projects up to 4x faster.
abstract_cn: 借助智能 AI 和集成解决方案，开启更快速、更顺畅的云转型之旅。本次会议揭示了 AWS Transform 如何通过智能自动化加速您的云之旅，应对迁移和现代化挑战。通过真实案例，了解如何利用这一强大的集成来快速推进您的云采用和转型工作。借助 AWS Transform 的专业 AI 代理，客户可以将 VMware 工作负载迁移到 Amazon EC2，将 .NET 应用程序现代化为跨平台 .NET，并对 IBM z/OS 大型机应用程序进行现代化改造，使转型项目的交付速度提升至多 4 倍。
